name: Summon Storm
text: Pay 800 LP; Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower WIND monster from your hand. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WIND monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Summon Storm" once per turn.
